body.p: The main function of this page is to help you to browse through the index terms defined in your documentation.
To easily find an entry, the list with indexterms are grouped by first letter. More over, at the top of the page is presented an alphabet link list ta easily go to a specific index terms group.

section.title: Indexterms Page Layout Components
section.p: The layout components displayed in the main page are:

dlentry.dd: Main page header area includes the publication title, logo, menu and a link to the index terms page.
The title of the publication. It is usually taken from the DITA map title.
Displays a logo associated with the publication. Additionally you can set a target URL that will be opened when you click on the logo image.
Helps you to navigate to your documentation. This components presents a set of links to all topics from your publication.
A link to the index terms page.
Input text field allowing you to easily enter your search queries.
Presents the content of the associated topic.
Presents a set of links to the parent topics.
A Table of Content for publication.
